name: Advanced Product Information for WooCommerce
author: VillaTheme

sections.description:
Display more intuitive information of products such as sale countdown, sale badges, who recently bought products, rank of products in their categories, available payment methods…

Documents | Facebook group

Important Notice:

  • Plugin works based on WooCommerce 3.x plugin.

  • It is released on WordPress.org and you can use plugin as free to build themes for sale.

FEATURES:

► Review Rating: A better reviews system to tell customers how buyers were satisfied with your products: Be the first to review this product – Display message when there is no review on a product page, 100% of buyers are satisfied with this product – Display message when all reviews are 5-stars reviews

► Product quantity: Display how many quantities of the product left in your store.

► Shipping options: Show shipping availability on the product page.

► Sale Saves: Display how much money customer can save if buying during discount time.

► Sale Countdown: Show a sale countdown timer for on-sale products. There’s an option to loop countdown timer for on-sale products without scheduled time.

► Sales count: Display message how many orders of the product in a chosen time. The order quantity can be got from WooCommerce or create virtually.

► Rank in Category: Display sale-rank of the product in categories with 3 available shortcodes {rank} {category} {time}.

► Payment Methods: Available payment methods will be displayed with icons or images.

► Social Proof: Display how many customers have visited the product page.

► Coupon: Display a coupon on the product page with full information: discount amount, expiry date.

► Recent orders: Who recently bought a product? This can be show to your customer

► Conditions: For each of the above features, you can set which products, categories to be included or excluded

► Design: All the advanced information is fully customizable with the message text, text color, text background color.

► Access our videos tutorials.

► Access our articles tutorials.

► Access our documents.

And much more things are waiting for you to discover

Check screenshots at https://villatheme.com/woo-advanced-product-information/ or https://villatheme.com/extensions/woo-advanced-product-information/

Documentation

sections.installation:
1. Unzip the download package
  2. Upload woo-advanced-product-information to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
